title: Web Server Breach
description:
Analyze this Apache access log. Which IP address successfully exploited a SQL injection vulnerability?

192.168.1.50 - - [01/Jan/2026:10:15:32 +0000] "GET /search.php?q=test HTTP/1.1" 200 1542
10.0.0.45 - - [01/Jan/2026:10:16:01 +0000] "GET /search.php?q=' OR '1'='1 HTTP/1.1" 200 8924
172.16.0.100 - - [01/Jan/2026:10:16:22 +0000] "GET /admin.php HTTP/1.1" 403 287
10.0.0.45 - - [01/Jan/2026:10:16:45 +0000] "GET /search.php?q=' UNION SELECT username,password FROM users-- HTTP/1.1" 200 15673
192.168.1.50 - - [01/Jan/2026:10:17:01 +0000] "GET /index.php HTTP/1.1" 200 3421

Submit as: flag{ip_address}
hints: Look for SQL injection patterns in query parameters (quotes, OR, UNION)
The attacker made multiple SQLi attempts â€” both returned 200 OK
A 200 response code with much larger size (15673) suggests data was extracted
